title: Leading cause of ransomware infection 2019
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Cause of ransomware infection, and Percentage of respondents in each Cause of ransomware infection on the y axis.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and lowest at Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
The lowest value at Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads is 4.19x times less than the highest value at Spam/phishing emails.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and lowest at Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
The highest Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has 51.0 more Percentage of respondents than the lowest Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.

Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails is higher than any other Cause of ransomware infections with value 67.0, followed by , and Weak passwords/access management. Down to Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads with the lowest value 16.0.
Similar Percentage of respondents is found in Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads, and Report clickbait.
The Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has 2.12 times more Percentage of respondents than average.
Summing up the values of all Cause of ransomware infections, we get total 190.0.
